title: Meta torrented & seeded 81.7 TB dataset containing copyrighted data
author: gameshot911
aiHeadline: Meta Gets Caught Red-Handed: Torrents 81.7 TB of Copyrighted Data to Train AI, Because Who Needs Permission Anyway, and Now Authors are Left to Pick Up the Pieces and Wonder if Their Life's Work is Just a Free Resource for Tech Giants

title: Apple Ordered by UK to Create Global iCloud Encryption Backdoor
author: throw0101d
aiHeadline: UK Government to Apple: 'Hey, Can You Please Create a Backdoor to iCloud Encryption for Us, Pretty Please with a Union Jack on Top, So We Can Snoop on All Your Users and Make Sure They're Not Up to Any Mischief'

title: Asahi Linux lead developer Hector Martin resigns from Linux kernel
author: Mond_
aiHeadline: Asahi Linux Lead Developer Hector Martin Resigns from Linux Kernel, Citing Reasons That Are Probably Totally Not Related to the Existential Crisis He Had After Realizing He's Been Contributing to Open-Source for Years Without Getting a Decent Paycheck

title: Donald Knuth's 2024 Christmas Lecture: Strong and Weak Components [video]
author: esbudylin
aiHeadline: Donald Knuth's 2024 Christmas Lecture is Out, and It's a Real Treat for All You Computer Science Nerds Out There, Featuring Strong and Weak Components, and Probably a Few Jokes About How Christmas is Just an Excuse to Talk About Algorithms

title: Announcing the data.gov archive
author: govideo
aiHeadline: Introducing the data.gov Archive: Because Who Needs Privacy When You Can Have a Treasure Trove of Free Data, and by Free We Mean 'Free to Be Used by Corporations to Make More Money', and by Treasure Trove We Mean 'A Bunch of PDFs and Spreadsheets'
